doc.title: Die Reise nach Nordland
doc.plot: Northland is a RTS game and the sequel to Cultures 2. The Cultures game series is very popular in Europe. Bjarni, a young viking hero and the son of Leif Erikson receives a call for help from his friends Hatchie, the Saracen and Bjarnis old friend, a fellow traveler from his old adventures. Serpent-like creatures have appeared and destroy Hatchies home country. Bjarni and his girl friend Crya are coming to help Hatchie and together they're heading out to stop the thread - and to save the world from destruction and chaos once again.
